quote: Itachi, you truly are a kind child. If I could, I would want you to be my little brother.
The true measure of a shinobi is not how he lives but how he dies. It's not what they do in life but what they did before dying that proves their worth.

People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define 'reality'. But what does it mean to be 'correct' or 'true'? Merely vague concepts... their 'reality' may all be a mirage.
It’s foolish to fear what we’ve yet to see and know.
Hard work is worthless for those that don’t believe in themselves.
The moment you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
I want to be strong enough to exorcise cursed spirits on my own, so I can save people.
Don't regret your choice afterwards. Think before you act!
Even if you don't have cursed energy, you can still live a happy life. Don't give up.
People who can't throw something important away, can never hope to change anything.
